halfling sheriff

Destiny Playbook

You have achieved the highest position in Halfling society - that of the sheriff, the peacekeeper, the sole authority in the relative lawlessness of halfling society.

Requirements

To become the Halfling Sheriff, you must earn the Fellowship of the Halflings.

The Halfling Sheriff starts with Size Matters Not.

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.the-halfling-sheriff.Item.mrwRxaNxx6ix6IRZ]{Size matters not}

Advancement

When you Level Up, choose one Advancement from either this list or from your Basic Playbook, then mark it. You may only choose each option once.

  • Take the Halfling Core Moves (Sting Like A Bee and The Little Folk). If you already have them, instead increase one of your stats by +1, to a maximum of +3.
  • Take a Halfling Custom.
  • Take a Halfling Sheriff Custom.
  • Take a Halfling Sheriff Custom.
  • Take a Halfling Sheriff Custom.
